We‚Äôre 3 friends and business partners who grew up in the 90s and helped get the Pok√©mon TCG off the ground ‚Äì not that they needed our help, but we were hooked! Now some 20 years later, we‚Äôre back to revitalize that passion. After starting and operating an online business for multiple years, we decided to expand by pursuing a passion project - opening a Local Game Store (LGS) / TCG hobby store. What is Top Shelf? Our vision for the store is different than what you'd expect from a typical LGS. We‚Äôre building something awesome, unlike any store you‚Äôve been to before. Our space is an open concept store with both a luxurious play space featuring our custom felt-wrapped tables, as well as a lounge-style seating to kick back in. You won‚Äôt find singles in our store, but our friendly, knowledgeable team is here to help with all your hobby questions and needs. Instead of walls of singles, we focus on having real conversations, curating an authentic community, and hosting awesome events that make the hobby more rewarding. Interested in discovering new trading card supplies to store, show off, and protect your precious collection? We‚Äôd love to showcase favourites from our extensive collection and find the perfect product for your needs. Looking for specific products or games? Let us know and we‚Äôll do what we can to get them in your hands. We can special order products even if we don't typically carry them. Wanting to learn more about the ins and outs of a trading card game? We‚Äôre more than happy to spend time getting you up to speed and sharing our insights so that you can dive into playing or collecting with confidence. Hoping to connect with new players and like-minded collectors? Join our discord community and look forward to a variety of events including casual play, tournaments, pre-releases, drafts, trade nights, learn-to-plays, build & paint nights, and much more! Top Shelf is all about the experience. We invite you to check it out for yourself; we‚Äôre confident that you‚Äôll be pleasantly surprised. Where are we in our journey? Following the soft launch of our concept retail store in summer 2021 (Phase 1), in fall 2023 we officially moved into Phase 2. From our original retail floor space of roughly 250 sf, we expanded the store to around 1200 sf by combining with the unit next door. We completed a full rebuild to create a unique space where you can hang out and enjoy your favourite hobbies. We're excited for you to experience our store, and we'll keep working to continue elevating the Top Shelf experience. When Phase 3? You‚Äôll just have to wait and see. For now we're excited to grow our Top Shelf community and establish ourselves as Canada's premier trading card & hobby store. So come check us out and join us on our journey! If not one of the owners - Colin, Jan, or Mo - you‚Äôll meet one of our store managers, Matt and Ricardo, or one of the amazing members of our growing team - Tariq, Julian, Lucas, Fern, Enzo, and Juan. 481 North Service Rd West Unit A14 Oakville, ON L6M 2V6 Contact us: shop@topshelfco.ca or use the live chat Info Search for a Product Shipping & Order Policies Refund Policy Terms of Service Privacy Policy About Us FAQs & Hours Sign up to get our latest updates! Meet the Team Top Shelf ‚Äî Top Shelf 0 Skip to Content Home Get a Quote Venues Company The Team Press Jobs Reviews FAQ Get A Quote Open Menu Close Menu Home Get a Quote Venues Company The Team Press Jobs Reviews FAQ Get A Quote Open Menu Close Menu Home Get a Quote Venues Folder: Company Back The Team Press Jobs Reviews FAQ Get A Quote Meet The Team Top Shelf Services has been providing unparalleled bartending and consulting services to Utah and surrounding states for over 15 years. We provide services aimed to exceed or clients‚Äô expectations by demonstrating professionalism, friendliness, and the willingness to go the distance for our clients‚Äô events. Our staff is certified, licensed, and insured giving our clients the professional team required to execute fun and memorable events. Casey Metzger A native of Maine, Utah resident since mid-90s. Casey Metzger, Founder of Top Shelf Services is no stranger to mixin‚Äô it up. With over 20 years of experience, he‚Äôll fill your cup time and time again with drinks that‚Äôll have you asking for another round. Owner/Founder Rosa Salguero Director of Finance &  Administration Raised here in Park City, Rosa is Top Shelf‚Äôs longest tenured employee. Her deep knowledge of the company's values and operations, combined with her unwavering dedication and commitment she has become the anchor of our management team. Andrew Shearman The mad scientist behind the operations of Top Shelf, Andy brings 18 years of culinary experience to the team. Juggling the tasks of inventory, cocktail creations, and insuring our A-Team is at each event. Director of Operations Chris Tang Director of Sales & Marketing He lives a different life than his days at Margaritaville, but that doesn‚Äôt mean Chris can‚Äôt manage a party! On any given day you can find him combing through final details, fixing some sort of electronic at the office, or popping into an event to make sure we served you, your dream. Transforming from a prolific ski career to local football coaching legend, Mikey has been elevating Top Shelf‚Äôs Special Events Program from the early days. Quarterbacking the Silly Market, Sundance Film Festival, and everything in between. If you‚Äôve got a special events game plan, Mikey‚Äôs the guy to execute it. Special Events Manager Mikey Collins Liz O‚ÄôConnell Sales Manager Liz's love for skiing and mountain towns has flourished from a young age. This passion has overlapped into her career in hospitality and now in her role as Sales Coordinator for Top Shelf. She's been a part of our team since 2019, but just recently came on board full-time. If you can't find her on the slopes or at the office, she's probably brushing up on her wine and whiskey knowledge. Jon Pineau Relocating from the East Coast nearly 10 years ago, Jon has taken on the creative venture for Top Shelf. When he‚Äôs not hiding behind the camera, you‚Äôll find him spinning an Old Fashioned or two. Marketing Manager Maggie Baillie As Operations Manager, Maggie is the steady hand behind the scenes, ensuring every event runs smoothly from prep to load-in. When she‚Äôs not double-checking ingredient orders, you‚Äôll find her hiking the Alps or supporting her favorite musicians and DJs.
